Name: Royal Duality
About the game: Let the story begin... “I haven’t seen a human for quite some time. Welcome, I am the guardian of stories. You came here to experience ‘Royal Duality’...one of the most important tales in my world. A small group from the Final Fae Kingdom are on a quest to find the powerful wizard, Oliver Lunastella, who has gone missing in the realm of the evil vampire Count Helmrick, who lives in the now desolate Evergreen Castle that once belonged to the Fae...or at least, that’s the story it told, the last time I read it…The narrative can be changed you see...by you.' Explore the world of Royal Duality with a mysterious and cryptic narrator. Make choices that will change the lives of the characters of the tale, and the world they live in. Discover hidden side stories, unlock all the endings and complete the compendium to reveal the truth behind this captivating plot and unlock the true motives of the mysterious 'Guardian of Stories'
